Columbus, Ohio Byer & Bowman Adv. Agency, Inc.
Excellent editorial support from media. Advertising activity in Negro
newspaper and on Negro radio station to encourage youth to take advantage of
job opportunities. Many additional summer camp openings for disadvantaged
arranged, and publicity program launched to inform disadvantaged of tuition-
free summertime educational opportunities. TV and radio program, "Town
Meeting,” reviewed Youth Opportunity program. HEY Corporation (Help Employ
Youths) organized to wash cars.
Dayton, Ohio Yeck & Yeck Inc.
Dayton Advertising Club and Public Relations Council recruited to
develop long-range, continuing support of Youth Opportunity Council
objectives. Staff of advisors on promotion and publicity now available to
agencies. TV and radio commercials keyed to jobs involve minority youth
who have jobs and are performing successfully to prove to others that "this
is for real.” Excellent media support for jobs, including full-page public
service advertising.
New Orleans, La. J, Walter Thompson Company, New Orleans
Nearly 3,000 radio spots and 360 TV spots scheduled for Youth Opportunity
programs, and full-page advertisement in the two daily newspapers.
